amendment.description: To require a report related to the E-8C JSTARS recapitalization program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1033 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1033 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5794) To require a report related to the E-8C JSTARS recapitalization program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1033 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1033 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 1003.
